extendedInfo.description: Sounds for chat is an Android application that will allow you to send the funniest sounds to your friends through Whatsapp, email or even Bluetooth.Have you ever found yourself in a Whatsapp conversation where the best reply would be a sound? (booing, applause, farting, cats, animals...). With Sounds for chat you can start sending sounds now!Using Sounds for chat is so easy! You only need to open the app, select the sound of your choice, share it with your Whatsapp friends and let the laughing start. You have almost 100 of them to choose!We've created this app because we do believe that, when it comes to Whatsapp chat, sometimes the best answer, is a sound.New sounds added! Check your Google Play updates to get improvements, more sounds and funny stuff!- Design and programming by David Rodillo.- Original Idea and content by Fernando Delgado.
